about_the_game:
In Polyphony, a world governed by music, Hip Hop was once a great culture that thrived and existed for the benefit of commoners and those who were impoverished. However, soon after the "Golden Age," The Evil Music Industry took over the world's music and forced those who practiced the 4 elements of Hip Hop into hiding for many years. Meanwhile, mysterious monsters known as "The Darkness" begin to appear around the world without explanation...

In this 2D action RPG demo, you play as BeNeVoLeNcE and Mega Ran as they take it upon themselves to restore the 4 Elements of Hip-Hop and save the world from the evil Music Industry and the Darkness. The story of TOTE follows their adventures as they journey around the musical world of Polyphony!
detailed_description:
In Polyphony, a world governed by music, Hip Hop was once a great culture that thrived and existed for the benefit of commoners and those who were impoverished. However, soon after the "Golden Age," The Evil Music Industry took over the world's music and forced those who practiced the 4 elements of Hip Hop into hiding for many years. Meanwhile, mysterious monsters known as "The Darkness" begin to appear around the world without explanation...

In this 2D action RPG demo, you play as BeNeVoLeNcE and Mega Ran as they take it upon themselves to restore the 4 Elements of Hip-Hop and save the world from the evil Music Industry and the Darkness. The story of TOTE follows their adventures as they journey around the musical world of Polyphony!
name: The T.O.T.E. Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3000 Series processor or equivalent
  • Graphics: GPU w/ 1GB Video RAM minimum
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad is recommended; Currently runs at upscaled 16:9 resolution

short_description: Save the world from the bad music of the Evil Music Industry in this Hip Hop-HEAVY 2D action RPG!
